Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to establishing the failure to refund school-related educational trips, tours or excursions during a declared state of emergency as an illegal act
Summary: Establishes the failure to provide a full monetary refund for school-related educational trips, tours or excursions during a declared state of emergency as an illegal act; such act shall be a misdemeanor.
LawCode: Add ยง158-b, amd ยง159, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to establishing the failure to refund school-related educational trips, tours or excursions during a declared state of emergency as an illegal act
